import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Links } from "../utils/constants"; import { ProductState } from "../redux/reducer"; const NavMenuTop = () => { const [open, setOpened] = useState(false); const { cart } = useSelector((state: ProductState) => state); const cost = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.price * item.quantity, 0); const cartlength = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0); return (
setOpened(!open) } className={`hamburger${open ? " active" : ""}`} title="Развернуть меню"> 8-044-734-56-78
    {Links.map((link) => (
  • {link.text} {link.text === "Каталог" && ( <> )} {link.children && (
      {link.children.map((child) => (
    • {child.text}
      • ))}
    )}
    • ))}
{cart.length > 0 ? ( {cartlength} шт. / {cost} byn ) : ( 0 шт. / 0 byn )}
); }; export default NavMenuTop;
